bibl.title: "Presocratics and Plato: Festschrift at Delphi in Honor of Charles Kahn. Papers Presented at the Festschrift Symposium in Honor of Charles Kahn Organized by the HYELE Institute for Comparative Studies, European Cultural Center of Delphi, June 3rd-7th, 2009, Delphi, Greece."
